statements: SELECT id, customer_id, feedback_text, rating, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback_surveys;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback_surveys WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback_surveys WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT id, customer_id, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback_surveys WHERE feedback_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback_surveys WHERE rating < 2;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback_surveys WHERE id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback_surveys WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT id, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback_surveys WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%improve%';
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback_surveys WHERE rating IN (4, 5) ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS average_rating, COUNT(*) AS total_feedbacks FROM customer_feedback_surveys GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_date, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT feedback_topic FROM FeedbackAnalytics;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_score, feedback_topic FROM FeedbackAnalytics WHERE feedback_score >= 3 ORDER BY feedback_analyzed_date;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_text) AS total_feedbacks FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(feedback_text) > 1;

SELECT FA.customer_id, CF.feedback_text, FA.feedback_score FROM CustomerFeedback CF JOIN FeedbackAnalytics FA ON CF.customer_id = FA.customer_id WHERE FA.feedback_score > 3 ORDER BY FA.feedback_analyzed_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM FeedbackAnalytics WHERE feedback_topic LIKE '%service%' ORDER BY analytics_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback_surveys;
SELECT customer_id, feedback FROM customer_feedback_surveys WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT survey_id, feedback FROM customer_feedback_surveys ORDER BY survey_id DESC;
SELECT survey_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM customer_feedback_surveys GROUP BY survey_id;
SELECT survey_id, analysis_result FROM feedback_analysis WHERE survey_id = 101;
SELECT survey_id, customer_id, feedback, rating FROM customer_feedback_surveys ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT survey_id, customer_id, feedback, rating FROM customer_feedback_surveys WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT survey_id, COUNT(*) as num_responses FROM survey_responses GROUP BY survey_id ORDER BY num_responses DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_result FROM feedback_analysis WHERE survey_id = 12345;
SELECT survey_id, feedback FROM customer_feedback_surveys WHERE feedback LIKE '%good%';
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedbackSurvey;
SELECT feedback, rating FROM CustomerFeedbackSurvey;
SELECT customer_id, feedback, rating FROM CustomerFeedbackSurvey WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT analysis_date, areas_for_improvement FROM FeedbackAnalysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM CustomerDetails WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedbackSurvey
SELECT feedback, rating FROM CustomerFeedbackSurvey WHERE rating > 3
SELECT name, email FROM CustomerDetails ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT question, answer FROM SurveyResponses WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT survey_id, analysis_date FROM FeedbackAnalysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedbackSurvey;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedbackSurvey WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedbackSurvey ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT response_text, responded_by FROM SurveyResponses WHERE response_id < 10;
SELECT tag_name, feedback_id FROM FeedbackTags WHERE tag_name LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedbackSurvey WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedbackSurvey WHERE customer_id = 10 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, response_text, responded_by FROM CustomerFeedbackSurvey JOIN SurveyResponses ON CustomerFeedbackSurvey.feedback_id = SurveyResponses.feedback_id;
SELECT category_name, description FROM FeedbackCategories WHERE category_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT feedback_text, tag_name FROM CustomerFeedbackSurvey JOIN FeedbackTags ON CustomerFeedbackSurvey.feedback_id = FeedbackTags.feedback_id WHERE FeedbackTags.tag_name = 'important';
